inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Label

on backing sheet, below image, in pencil: [Nicolo Paganini Wm Mortensen]; URC, in the image: [NICOLO/ PAGANINI]; L edge center, n the image: [GENOA 1827]; on back of mount, in pencil: [class A. No. 1/ Nicolo Paganini/ Wm Mortensen, / Laguna Beach, Calif.] and [Bromide]; on back of mount, in red pencil: [450-M]; on back of mount in green pencil [A]; on back of mount, in blue pencil: [34.5.185]; on back of mount, on label: [THIS PRINT/ IS THE PROPERTY OF THE/ Museum of Science and Industry/ Founded by Julius Rosenwald/ Chicago, Illinois/ Donor Mortensen, William-Laguna Beach, Calif./ Date Jan 1934/ Museum Access. No. 34.5.185]
title: Nicolo Paganini
